data.enText: advice, criticism or information about how good or useful sth or sb's work is

data.chText: 如果有人对我的工作提出意见我将感激不尽。
data.enText: I'd appreciate some feedback on my work.

data.chText: 老师会对你的测验提供反馈信息。
data.enText: The teacher will give you feedback on the test.

data.chText: 我们需要顾客正反两方面的反馈意见。
data.enText: We need both positive and negative feedback from our customers.
the unpleasant noise produced by electrical equipment such as an amplifier when some of the power returns to the system

ex.chText: 该评论员批评了政府对石油危机的反应。
ex.enText: The commentator criticized the government's reaction to the oil crisis.

ex.chText: 这一政策引起了工人们的愤怒。
ex.enText: The policy produced an angry reaction from workers.

synonyms.bx: 指对发生的事情或他人的话语所作的反应，常后接介词 to。

ex.chText: 请尽量给每个作品提点反馈意见。
ex.enText: Please try to give each piece of work some feedback.

ex.chText: 他们对我的工作提出了一些意见。
ex.enText: They gave me some feedback on my work.

synonyms.bx: 指针对某事物给出的建议、批评等，常后接介词 on。

ex.chText: 她敲了敲门，但是没人应声。
ex.enText: She knocked on the door, but there was no reply.

ex.chText: 他们的信还没有收到任何回复。
ex.enText: No reply to their letter has been received.

synonyms.bx: 指通过言语、信件等对某事作的回应，常后接介词 to。

ex.chText: 她儿子没有回答，继续看电影。
ex.enText: Her son made no response, and went on with his movie.

ex.chText: 我现写信回复您的询问。
ex.enText: I am writing in response to your inquiry.

ex.chText: 这部小说得到读者的好评。
ex.enText: This novel has received a positive response from readers.

synonyms.bx: 指口头或书面的答复，也指对某事的反应，常后接介词 to。

tr: response to an inquiry or experiment
the process in which part of the output of a system is returned to its input in order to regulate its further output

value.def: If you get feedback on your work or progress, someone tells you how well or badly you are doing, and how you could improve. If you get good feedback you have worked or performed well.

example.ex: Continue to ask for feedback on your work...
example.tran: 继续征求对你的工作的反馈意见。

example.ex: I was getting great feedback from my boss.

value.def: Feedback is the unpleasant high-pitched sound produced by a piece of electrical equipment when part of the signal that comes out goes back into it.

trans: 负反馈，负反应；缩写为NF, NFB
信息反馈；反馈；信息回馈；资讯回馈
力回馈，力反馈(给电脑屏幕上的物体赋予重量等物理属性的模拟过程)
